definitions.definition: too much of a drug taken or given at one time, either intentionally or by accident:
examples: When he was 17 he took an overdose of sleeping pills and nearly died.
After watching two operas, I was suffering from an overdose of culture.

definitions.definition: to take too much of a drug:
examples: She overdosed on aspirin and died.

definitions.definition: to have too much of something:
examples: I think I've just overdosed on cheesecake!
